Class UserDAOPostgres

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.persist.postgres.UserDAOPostgres
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UserDAOPostgres extends Object implements UserDAO
PostgreSQL implementation of the UserDAO interface. Provides methods for user authentication by interacting with the PostgreSQL database.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public User login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user by their username and password. Queries the PostgreSQL database for a matching user and retrieves their information if authenticated.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password of the user attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details if authentication is successful, or null if no match is found.

    • register

      public User register(String email, String password, String username, String firstName, String lastName, int phoneNumber)
      Registers a new user with the specified details. Inserts a new user record into the PostgreSQL database with the provided information.
      Specified by:
      register in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details if registration is successful, or null if the operation fails.

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(String email, String password, String username, String firstName, String lastName, int phoneNumber, boolean admin)
      Creates a new user with the specified details. Inserts a new user record into the PostgreSQL database with the provided information.
      Specified by:
      createUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user.
      admin - The admin status of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • readUser

      public User readUser(int id)
      Retrieves a user by their unique identifier. Queries the PostgreSQL database for a user with the specified ID and returns their details.
      Specified by:
      readUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details if found, or null if no match is found.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers(User user)
      Retrieves a user by their unique username. Queries the PostgreSQL database for a user with the specified username and returns their details.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsers in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details if found, or null if no match is found.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Retrieves a user by their unique username. Queries the PostgreSQL database for a user with the specified username and returns their details.
      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details if found, or null if no match is found.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(int id)
      Deletes a user by their unique identifier. Removes the user record from the PostgreSQL database with the specified ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the user was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • followUser

      public boolean followUser(int idFollowed, int idFollower)
      Follows a user. Inserts a follow record into the PostgreSQL database and updates the follower and followee counts.
      Specified by:
      followUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      idFollowed - The ID of the user to be followed.
      idFollower - The ID of the user who is following.
      Returns:
      true if the follow operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • unfollowUser

      public boolean unfollowUser(int idFollowed, int idFollower)
      Unfollows a user. Deletes a follow record from the PostgreSQL database and updates the follower and followee counts.
      Specified by:
      unfollowUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      idFollowed - The ID of the user to be unfollowed.
      idFollower - The ID of the user who is unfollowing.
      Returns:
      true if the unfollow operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteAccount

      public boolean deleteAccount(int id, String password)
      Deletes a user account if the provided password matches. Removes the user record from the PostgreSQL database with the specified ID and password.
      Specified by:
      deleteAccount in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user to delete.
      password - The password of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the account was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateAccount

      public boolean updateAccount(User user)
      Updates the account details of the current user. Modifies the user record in the PostgreSQL database with the provided information.
      Specified by:
      updateAccount in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing the updated details.
      Returns:
      true if the account was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • isFollowing

      public boolean isFollowing(int idFollowed, int idFollower)
      Checks if a user is following another user. Queries the PostgreSQL database to determine if a follow record exists between the specified users.
      Specified by:
      isFollowing in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      idFollowed - The ID of the user being followed.
      idFollower - The ID of the user following.
      Returns:
      true if the user is following, false otherwise.

    • getFollowsIds

      public int[] getFollowsIds(int id_follower)
      Retrieves the IDs of users followed by the specified user. Queries the PostgreSQL database for the IDs of users followed by the specified user.
      Specified by:
      getFollowsIds in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      id_follower - The ID of the user who is following.
      Returns:
      An array of user IDs that the specified user is following.
